thread.title: Hollyoaks 20th anniversary week: We finally know the identity of the Gloved Hand Killer
thread.title_full: Hollyoaks 20th anniversary week: We finally know the identity of the Gloved Hand Killer

title: Hollyoaks 20th anniversary week: We finally know the identity of the Gloved Hand Killer
text:
Hollyoaks 20th anniversary week: We finally know the identity of the Gloved Hand Killer Hollyoaks 20th anniversary week: We finally know the identity of the Gloved Hand Killer 
Press Association 2014 / / National Entertainment News Share 
In an E4 preview episode which aired tonight after Hollyoaks on Channel 4, the Gloved Hand Killer struck again… but this time, we finally found out who it is. If you're watching #Hollyoaks20Years on @Channel4 now … I cannot stress this enough – watch the #FirstLook on E4 at 7 to avoid spoilers :p
